RumorFact.Text: A new planet in the solar system.

ExploreFact.Text: A mysterious, large door at the capital. The Nomai says they haven't been able to open it for centuries.
I convinced every clan to contribute their shard, but we're still missing one.

AltText.Text: I completed the key by using each clan's shard and the lost Fifth Shard. When I put the last shard in, the door opened.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet.
A Nomai told me that, to see their leader, I have to prove my worth by stealing something from one of the southern clans.
The Nomai said that there isn't anything good to steal right now.

AltText.Text: The Nomai said that I need to steal the sacred shrubbery from the southern clan I visited.

ExploreFact.Text: The leader of the Nomai settlement agreed to help us open the door by giving their shard to us.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai settlement on the north side of the planet.
One of the Nomai told me I had to give them a cockpit to see their leader.
The leader of the Nomai settlement agreed to help us open the door by giving their shard to us.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Ghird village on the south side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Ghird village on the south side of the planet.
One of the Ghirds said I had to find the lost sacred shrubbery to see their leader.
The leader of the Ghird village agreed to help us open the door by giving their shard to us.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai told me that one of the shards was in a Ghird village on the south side of the planet.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Ghird village on the south side of the planet.
The Ghird at the leader's house told me I had to return at 2:00 to enter.
The leader of the Ghird village agreed to help us open the door by giving their shard to us.

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai at the Great Door told me there was a fifth shard of the key that went missing.
The leader of Nomai Settlement B told me that the fifth shard was on the South Pole.
The leader of Nomai Settlement A told me that the fifth shard is reached with the red rock.
The leader of Ghird Village A told me that the fifth shard is accessed through the largest hole.
The leader of Ghird Village B told me that the fifth shard needs a bright, white light.
